WorkItem.Summary: Apply active Filtering and/or Sorting to an Autofilter

Comments.Message: This feature is now actively being implemented
Applying active filters is currently under development, but sorting will not be implemented as this actively changes the row data in the worksheet to match the sorting sequence
Autofilter expressions for Excel2007 Reader and Writer complete and available in the develop branch on github, together with documentation on how to use them
Is this resolved, the last comment seem to imply that it is but the status is still Active.

It's still open because it's only available for Excel2007 Reader and Writer, but not for Excel5, Gnumeric, OOCalc, etc.... and sorting will never be handled by PHPExcel because it actually changes the data in each row
